title: League client will not open
body:
~ I've tried running the Hextech Repair Tool
~ I've tried starting the application (not the shortcut) with elevated privileges
~ I've tried starting the old client with elevated privleges 
~ I've white listed it on my antivirus
~ I've made no recent changes besides switching from Avast to Malware-bytes (It was running fine yesterday)
~ Am currently repatching using the Hextech Repair Tool

Any other Ideas? When I try to run the application, The league of legends badge comes up but the client fails to start every time. I see the application running in task manager, but there's no GUI

Please help

replies.body:
I have THE PROB that i cannot start th client wiz my wifi!! and when i succeed , it will try to reconnect all the time.. sI used the internet wiz my phone and i can lauch that but too slow. I enter the game and i can use my  wifi , no pb..
So weied...

I have already installed the game and that did not change..
I did what others told me, change DNS or sth else. That worded a little but.. then broken again.. 
fckkk

restarting my computer solved everything.. 

...


I hate technology
Oh wow!  >.>  Glad everything is okay now!
Either way, I'm very grateful to have gotten a response! Cheers

This sounds like a permissions issue to me, like an antivirus or OS setting blocking the client from loading.  You've already check your antivirus and ran some solid steps, so grab the logs in the HRT and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide just to make sure everything is covered, and our tech team will get back to you in case we missed anything with those logs.  We'll figure this out!
actually the patcher won't even open up now. Now I'm getting pretty frustrated.. I just want to play.
re-patching option netted no results, I'm gonna try re-installing
